title: start
headline: Welcome to the EUROMAT for the European Elections 2019!
content:
You‘re thinking: What‘s a EUROMAT? The EUROMAT is not a regular voting advice application. On the contrary, it is your digital tool navigating you through the policies and visions of the current European parties. The goal of the EUROMAT is to support you to make an informed choice for the upcoming European elections!

Last but not least: **Whatever your result, the final choice is up to YOU!** 

The EUROMAT focuses mainly on one thing – making your voting experience fun while providing you with all essential information about the main positions of the European parties.\
Which European party matches your opinions and future vision of the European Union most? Come back here in a few days and find out!
